scripts.css-lint-docs: bundle exec scss-lint --config node_modules/bootstrap/.scss-lint.yml --exclude assets/scss/docs.scss assets/scss/*.scss
scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/global.scss web/css/app.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/bootstrap-grid.scss web/css/bootstrap-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/bootstrap-reboot.scss web/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.css-compile-docs: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/docs.scss assets/css/docs.min.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output web/css/bootstrap.min.css web/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output web/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css web/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output web/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css web/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.js: npm-run-all js-lint cp-jquery cp-holder js-compile js-minify
scripts.js-lint: eslint js/ && eslint --config node_modules/bootstrap/js/.eslintrc.json --env node build/ Gruntfile.js
scripts.js-compile-bundle: shx cat node_modules/popper.js/dist/popper.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/util.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/alert.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/button.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/carousel.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/collapse.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/dropdown.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/modal.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/scrollspy.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/tab.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/tooltip.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/popover.js es6/hello.js es6/test.js | shx sed "s/^(import|export).*//" | babel --filename node_modules/bootstrap/js/src/bootstrap.js | node node_modules/bootstrap/build/stamp.js > web/js/app.js
scripts.js-minify-docs: uglifyjs --config-file node_modules/bootstrap/build/uglifyjs.config.json --output assets/js/docs.min.js assets/js/vendor/anchor.min.js assets/js/vendor/clipboard.min.js assets/js/vendor/holder.min.js assets/js/src/application.js
scripts.js-test-cloud: ruby -r webrick -e "s = WEBrick::HTTPServer.new(:Port => 3000, :DocumentRoot => Dir.pwd, :Logger => WEBrick::Log.new('/dev/null'), :AccessLog => []); trap('INT') { s.shutdown }; s.start" & grunt saucelabs-qunit
scripts.docs-github: shx echo 'github: true' > $npm_config_tmp/twbsconfig.yml && npm run docs-compile -- --config _config.yml,$npm_config_tmp/twbsconfig.yml && shx rm $npm_config_tmp/twbsconfig.yml
scripts.maintenance-dependencies: ncu -a -x jquery && npm update && bundle update && shx echo 'Manually update assets/js/vendor/*, js/tests/vendor/*, bower.json and .travis.yml'
scripts.release-zip: cd dist/ && zip -r9 bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist.zip * && shx mv bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist.zip ..
scripts.watch-css: nodemon --ignore js/ --ignore web/ -e scss -x "npm run css-compile"
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --ignore scss/ --ignore js/dist/ --ignore dist/ -e js -x "npm run js-compile-plugins"
